game.name: Helicopter Shooter
game.description:
Are you an ardent fan of online flying games? Luckily, you have reached at the right place since here we have brought to you a highly engaging and interacting aeroplane game â€“ Helicopter Shooter. We hope that you will have a great fun and thrill in this one of the best action games for boys. The best thing about this online game is that you can explore it in your system for free. Your objective in this helicopter game is to shoot all the enemies down and collect as much points as you can to create a high score on the screen. 

Make sure to keep your eyes on the screen all the time since you might be killed by your enemies as you lose your attention. In this shooting game for kids, you will be given three lives. So, play confidently and use your every life to add some valuable points to your final score. Helicopters of your enemies are spreading everywhere right from the top to the bottom of the screen. They will keep firing on you with an objective to affect your health badly. So, use the arrow keys regularly to move your helicopter to a safe place to maintain your health. 

Keep pressing the space bar key to shoot down your enemies and increase your points on the scoreboard. Follow the instructions wisely to create a respected score for yourself in this cool HTML5 helicopter game! Apply your aeroplane flying skills to win this game in your PC, mobile phone or gaming console! We have plenty of other more action games on your website. Check them out one by one to add extra fun and thrill to your boring hours!! Have a lovely time friends!!
